html:
3i Infrastructure plc, a Jersey-incorporated, closed-ended investment company, has agreed to invest additional EUR25 million in Valorem SAS, a renewable energy company

3i Infrastructure has agreed to invest the funds through a capital increase to fund its growth, raising the company's stake in Valorem to 33%.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)28.17
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryDIRECT INVESTMENT
Deal StatusAnnounced: 2021-12-16

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Valorem SAS

Deal Rationale
